POS 2 11,8

DLG a
We feed on dreams. We're just ghosts looking for a reality... Reality might be that way, btw. By the big tree.

DLG b
I don't know, things fade away. What do I care if it's a dream?

DLG c
Do not be afraid

DLG f
We are watching the night

DLG g
... maybe you're just shaking because of the cold?

DLG h
We cannot save you, actually. That's a common misconception.

DLG i
We cannot save you, actually. That's a common misconception.

DLG j
I love tungsten, personally.

DLG k
Seeking, seeking... what?

DLG d
The darkness is your destiny and your past. The future is blind. We are only memories, fragile and fading. Don't forget us.

DLG e
The darkness is your destiny and your past. The future is blind. We are only memories, fragile and fading. Don't forget us.

END 0
You are not alone. We're always with you, in the shadows.

END undefined
